Crie o arquivo api/nullstack.js<\/code> para exportar o servidor de produção.<\/p> 

import<\/span> application from<\/span> '../.production/server'<\/span>

export<\/span> default<\/span> application.<\/span>server;<\/span>
<\/code><\/pre>

Adicione a seguinte configuração no vercel.json<\/code> na raiz da sua aplicação para redirecionar todos requests do nullstack:<\/p>

{<\/span>
  "version"<\/span>:<\/span> 2<\/span>,<\/span>
  "functions"<\/span>:<\/span> {<\/span>
    "api/nullstack.js"<\/span>:<\/span> {<\/span>
      "includeFiles"<\/span>:<\/span> ".production/**"<\/span>
    }<\/span>
  }<\/span>,<\/span>
  "routes"<\/span>:<\/span> [<\/span>
    {<\/span>
      "handle"<\/span>:<\/span> "filesystem"<\/span>
    }<\/span>,<\/span>
    {<\/span>
      "src"<\/span>:<\/span> "(.*)"<\/span>,<\/span>
      "dest"<\/span>:<\/span> "api/nullstack.js"<\/span>
    }<\/span>
  ]<\/span>
}<\/span>
<\/code><\/pre>
